opis: Luksuzna samostojeća vila u Vodicama – samo 400 metara od mora! U srcu prekrasnih Vodica, na idealnoj lokaciji, prodaje se luksuzna samostojeća vila udaljena svega 400 metara od kristalno čistog mora i pješčane plaže. Smještena u mirnom okruženju, a ipak u blizini svih sadržaja potrebnih za udoban život i uspješan turistički najam, ova vila nudi savršen spoj elegancije, komfora i privatnosti. Izgrađena 2023. godine prema najvišim standardima struke, vila je odmah postala prepoznatljiva na tržištu luksuznih nekretnina. Od tada se koristi za cjelogodišnji turistički najam, ostvarujući izvrsne godišnje prihode. Unutrašnjost vile odiše prostranošću i luksuzom. Na katu se nalaze tri elegantne spavaće sobe, od kojih dvije imaju vlastite, prostrane kupaonice s modernim walk-in tuševima. Svaka soba ima izlaz na balkon koji se proteže duž cijele sjeverne strane objekta, pružajući predivan pogled i osjećaj slobode. Posebna prednost ove vile je krovna nenatkrivena terasa, do koje se dolazi elegantnim stepenicama, a s koje se pruža očaravajući pogled na more. Prizemlje je osmišljeno kao savršen spoj funkcionalnosti i estetike. Prostrani dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom odiše toplinom i udobnošću, dok potpuno opremljena high-class kuhinja omogućava pripremu gastronomskih delicija u luksuznom okruženju. Dodatni WC i još jedna spavaća soba upotpunjuju skladan raspored ove jedinstvene nekretnine. Svaka prostorija opremljena je vrhunskim klimatizacijskim uređajima, modernim električnim roletama te pažljivo biranim luksuznim namještajem. Cijela vila ograđena je visokim zidovima koji pružaju potpunu privatnost, a daljinski upravljana kapija omogućuje siguran ulaz na prostrano dvorište s parkirnim mjestima za dva automobila. Uživanje na otvorenom podignuto je na novu razinu zahvaljujući prostranom dvorištu koje krasi veliki bazen dimenzija 8x3 metra s ugrađenom strojarnicom i vanjskim tušem. Roštilj, vrtna alatna kućica i luksuzni vanjski namještaj dodatno naglašavaju sofisticiranost i ugodnost ovog prekrasnog ambijenta. Za dodatni osjećaj sigurnosti, vila je opremljena 24/7 video nadzorom. Prodaje se potpuno namještena i opremljena vrhunskim dizajnerskim detaljima, čime budućem vlasniku omogućava trenutni užitak bez dodatnih ulaganja. Ova elegantna i moderna vila predstavlja savršen spoj luksuza, udobnosti i idealne lokacije, bilo da tražite dom iz snova ili isplativu investiciju u turistički najam. In the heart of beautiful Vodice, in an ideal location, a luxury detached villa is for sale just 400 meters from the crystal clear sea and sandy beach. Located in a peaceful environment, yet close to all the amenities needed for a comfortable life and successful tourist rental, this villa offers the perfect blend of elegance, comfort and privacy. Built in 2023 to the highest professional standards, the villa immediately became recognizable on the luxury real estate market. Since then, it has been used for year-round tourist rental, generating excellent annual income. The interior of the villa exudes spaciousness and luxury. On the first floor there are three elegant bedrooms, two of which have their own, spacious bathrooms with modern walk-in showers. Each room has access to a balcony that stretches along the entire north side of the property, providing a beautiful view and a sense of freedom. A special advantage of this villa is the roof terrace, which is reached by elegant stairs and offers a breathtaking view of the sea. The ground floor is designed as a perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics. The spacious living room with dining area exudes warmth and comfort, while the fully equipped high-class kitchen allows you to prepare gastronomic delicacies in luxurious surroundings. An additional toilet and another bedroom complete the harmonious layout of this unique property. Each room is equipped with top-quality air conditioning units, modern electric shutters and carefully selected luxurious furniture. The entire villa is surrounded by high walls that provide complete privacy, and a remote-controlled gate allows safe entry to the spacious yard with parking spaces for two cars. Enjoying the outdoors is raised to a new level thanks to the spacious yard, which is adorned with a large 8x3 meter swimming pool with a built-in engine room and an outdoor shower. A barbecue, garden tool shed and luxurious outdoor furniture further emphasize the sophistication and comfort of this beautiful setting. For an added sense of security, the villa is equipped with 24/7 video surveillance. It is being sold fully furnished and equipped with top-notch designer details, allowing the future owner to enjoy it immediately without any additional investment. This elegant and modern villa represents the perfect blend of luxury, comfort and an ideal location, whether you are looking for a dream home or a profitable investment in a tourist rental.
